Technical Documentation¶

  • Actuators

  • Device types, features and usages

  • Database: Model

  • UI: Model

  • RINOR: Overview | Statistics Manager: Store into the database the xPL activity on Network

    • REST /base: Get data from the database (area, rooms, devices, events, etc)
    • REST /command: Send commands to devices
    • REST /events: Get events
    • REST /stats: Get stats from the database
    • REST /account: List accounts, login, etc
    • REST /plugin: Start, stop xPL plugins
    • REST /xpl-cmnd: Directly send a xPL message
    • REST /repo: Store files
    • REST /helper: Helpers
